description: Design and implement a CDKTF configuration for an e-commerce product catalog service using ECS and ElastiCache Redis for performance optimization in South America region.
background: FastShop, a growing e-commerce platform in Brazil, needs to implement a scalable product catalog system that can handle high-traffic periods like Black Friday. The system must maintain fast response times and comply with Brazilian e-commerce regulations (LGPD).

required_components: ECS Fargate cluster for containerized catalog service
ElastiCache Redis for caching product data

constraints: All resources must be deployed in sa-east-1 region to ensure low latency for Brazilian customers; Redis cache must be configured with encryption at rest and in-transit for LGPD compliance
aws_services: Amazon EC2 (NAT Gateway, Internet Gateway, Security Groups)
